name: SVGCircleElement.r
description: The r read-only property of the SVGCircleElement interface reflects the r attribute of a circle element and by that defines the radius of the circle.

refs.name: Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) 2
refs.description: The definition of 'SVGCircleElement.r' in the 'Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) 2' specification.
